Title: Evocations of the Northern Breeze

Leeds' muses echo in post-punk whispers,
Overload's debt lingers,
Chasing the ghost of Fall.
Sprechgesang squire stands unmask'd,
Vocal waves birth self-revelations
By the flirtatious stream's edge,
Crumbling thoughts into water's arcane caress.
A Utopia, elusive and teasing,
Breeds in the crucible of chords,
A phoenix ascending from a Yard Act,
An arresting rumination it affords.
